mapper.select: select * from orderlist where TO_CHAR(oldate,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') and scode = #{scode}

select oseq ,mname1, mname2, mname3, mname4, mname5, mname6, mname7, mname8, mname9, mname10, sum(olcount1) as olcount1, sum(olcount2) as olcount2, sum(olcount3) as olcount3, sum(olcount4) as olcount4, sum(olcount5) as olcount5, sum(olcount6) as olcount6, sum(olcount7) as olcount7, sum(olcount8) as olcount7, sum(olcount9) as olcount10, sum(olcount10) as olcount10, sum(mprice1) as mprice1, sum(mprice2) as mprice2, sum(mprice3) as mprice3, sum(mprice4) as mprice4, sum(mprice5) as mprice5, sum(mprice6) as mprice6, sum(mprice7) as mprice7, sum(mprice8) as mprice8, sum(mprice9) as mprice9, sum(mprice10) as mprice10 from orderlist where scode = #{scode} and ostate=#{ostate} group by oseq,mname1,mname2,mname3,mname4,mname5,mname6,mname7,mname8,mname9,mname10
select * from orderlist where scode = #{scode} and ostate=#{ostate}
select * from orderlist where scode = #{scode} and oseq=#{oseq}
mapper.update: update orderlist set ostate=2 where oseq=#{oseq}
update orderlist set ostate=4 where oseq=#{oseq}
update orderlist set ostate=3 where oseq=#{oseq}
mapper.select: select kid, mname1, mname2, mprice1, mprice2, olcount1, olcount2, oldate, oseq, ospot,ostate, scode, sname from orderlist where scode = #{scode}
